, is a city of peace and quite, its houses with pointed red roofs being scattered along the verdant mountain slopes.

Kaçanik is the first major Kosovar town en route when coming from
, except for the border village of Hani i Elezit/Elez Han.
The best way to get to Kačanik is by bus from

. 
You can also catch a bus from
.  Most bus companies that run from
to Pristina continue onward and terminate in Kačanik. There are several direct buses from
(7hours, 1 day bus & 2 night busses, run by Kosovo Albanian companies, cost about 10Euro, stops depending on the route in

, Pristina and other towns on the road, information dates from February 2005). 
Additionally, on a very questionable road through the mountains you can arrive from

From the bus station everything is within walking distance.
The community of Kaçanik (kaçanikas, kachanikas) is very kind and pleasant, so don't miss it, visit this beauty and peace city!!

One of the best places to go is Titanik Bar Caffe / Restaurant, cheap prices and good environment. Also RRAP Bar Caffe is a good place! So don't miss it!!
Egzona Bar coffee is very good.
